LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.EnableScheduler.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If this import template has Scheduler.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.EntityType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the type of entity (Product, Category, Manufacturer, etc.).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.EmailAccount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the email account if you want to get report about updating values.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.EntityKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the entity key for mapping new values from the feed file and old values from the database. Ex. Product Sku - plugin will look the product using Sku.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.EntityKey.Tips
LocaleResource.Value:
The plugin will use this key for mapping new values from the feed file and old values from the database.
You must add the Key column in the mapping table.
Example 1:
You want to update the name of products with new values. You exported nopcommerce products in the Excell and leave two columns, ID and Name.
Change the names of products and upload this feed file back yo nopcommerce.
You need to configure Entity Key = ID and add column '0' as a Key in the mapping table. Example 2:
You want to add new options (exc. Red and Black) to the speciaification attributes (ex. Color).
You need to create a csv file with two columns
Attribute, Option
Color, Red
Color, Black
Create the template for importing specification attribute option and configure 'Key' = 'Name', add the column 'Attribute' as a key.
The plugin will look for spacifition attribute with the name 'Color' and add new options.
Example 3:
'Id' - find products/categories/manufacturers/etc. using nopcommerce product/category/manufacturer/etc Id.
Add the column Key with integer values in the feed file add the plugin will look for products with such IDs.
Example 4:
'Sku' - find products using Sku
Add the column with Sku values in the feed file and add this Key in the mapping table.
Example 5:
'Name' - find products/categories/manufacturers/etc. using the Name of product/category/manufacturer/etc.
Add the column with the name of product/category/manufacturer in the feed file and add this Key in the mapping table.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.Warehouse.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the warehouse from the list if you want to update only values for one warehouse.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.Manufacturer.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the manufacturer from the list if you want to update only products of one manufacturer.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.Vendor.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the vendor from the list if you want to update only products of one vendor.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name of template. This name can help you to order your update teamplates.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.SkipFirstLine
LocaleResource.Value: Skip first line in the csv/txt/xlsx file

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.SkipFirstLine.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Skip first line in the csv/txt/xlsx file, because this line has a column header.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveTierPrices.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has new tier prices plugin removes old tier prices for this product.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveProductAttributes.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has new Product Attribute Values plugin removes old all Product Attributes and Product Attributes Values for this product.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveProductAttributeCombinations
LocaleResource.Value: Remove all old Product Attribute Combinations

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveProductAttributeCombinations.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has new Product Attribute Combinations plugin removes old all Product Attribute Combinations for this product.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveProductAttributeValues.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has new Product Attribute Values plugin removes old Product Attributes Values for this product and add the new ones.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveProductSpecifications.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has new Product Specification Options plugin removes old all Product Specifications and Product Specification Options for this product.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveProductSpecificationOptions.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has new Product Specification Options plugin removes old Product Specification Options for this product and add the new ones.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemovePictures.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has pictures plugin removes old pictures before.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveAssociatedPicture.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product attribute value or product attribute combination has picture than plugin will remove old associated picture from the picture list of the products.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveCategories.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has category mapping than plugin removes old category mappings before.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveManufacturers.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has manufacturer mappings than plugin removes old manufacturer mappings before.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveTags.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has tag mappings than plugin removes old tag mappings before.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveRelatedProduct.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has Related Products than plugin removes old Related Products before.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.RemoveCrossSellProduct.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product from the import file has Cross-Sell Products than plugin removes old Cross-Sell Products before.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.UpdateExistingSpecifications.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If product has such product specification value than plugin will replace it. Example. Product has Color 'Red' and you want to replace it with new value 'Black'. Otherway plugin will add the new specififctaion option value and this product will have 'Red' and 'Black'.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.AddNewSpecificationOption.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If specification attribute doesn't have such specififcation option than plugin will add it. Example. Specification attribute 'Color' doesn't have option 'Red' than plugin will add it with default values and other products will use it.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.ColumnDelimiter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Column delimiter (ex. ',', ';','\t', 'tab'). Put value without quotes.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.FieldEnclosure.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Some of field uses " for enclosing. Put value without quotes, ex. ".

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.DecimalDelimiter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select decimal delimiter for price value (dot or comma).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.ImportTemplate.Fields.DateTimeFormat.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: DateTime format, ex. 'yyyy-dd-MM hh:mm tt' or 'dd.MM.yyyy hh:mm:ss'.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.UploadZipFile.ImportFromZIPTip
LocaleResource.Value:
Import data from ZIP file. This ZIP has to have one feed file in csv/txt/xlxs/xml format and pictures, if you need to import them. Plugin will upload this ZIP file to the server and will try to import new values from it.
Example:
newproducts.zip has files:
newproduct.csv - the feed file
and pictures:
Iphone.jpg
Ipad.jpg
Stylus.jpg

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Feed.ImportManager.UploadFile.ImportFromTip
LocaleResource.Value: Import data from the feed file (XML, CSV, XLSX, TSV).
